snippet.title: Blade of Blackpoole walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - Sirius software)
snippet.description:
Blade of Blackpoole (http://mocagh.org/loadpage.php?getgame=blackpoole) was a graphics adventure game published by Sirius software in 1982 for the Apple ][. The player is on a quest to recover the stolen magical sword MYRAGLYM and return it back to the altar. Like Gruds in Space (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JZcoI8x3als), the player will encounter the Sirius mascot in this game.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - mocagh.org
Walkthrough - www.textfiles.com (The Mines of Moria, Ron Henderson)
